price: Onyankopͻn yε Ayεmyε Hene dema Nenkoa. Ɔbͻ obi a Ɔpε akͻnhoma, na Ɔne Ɔhoͻdenfoͻ no, Ɔne Otumfoͻ no a Otumi ade nyinaa yε.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
